name: 90's Point & Click prototype
description:
Part of a 3 day game jam at work. I wanted to recreate the feeling playing Pajama Sam or Putt-putt. Lots of stuff missing & layering issues, but overall, not bad! More updates to come? I would love to get the inventory system visible as well as more animation.

Once you give 'some dude' the diamond, the 'game' is essentially over.
